TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BlockCollection extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Documents.Block>

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block"> elements. BlockCollection defines the allowable child content of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Floater>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks BlockCollection creation is only permitted inside an element that owns a BlockCollection, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>. As such, a BlockCollection cannot be instantiated directly and has no default or overloaded constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>.
Docs.value: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block"> element in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>.

Docs.summary: Gets the last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>.
Docs.value: The last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block"> element in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>.
